resources.string: CodeWithJun here! This is an application that you requested, an application that can get place data and place suggestion.

Please note that this application using Google Maps APIs (3 apis that you request to use) and it is quite pricey. You can test the application however you want, but please do it wisely (since I already use nearly half of the free credits for university project).
If you have any question or stuff, you can find my contact at alfrdjuan.com Thank you and looking forward to work with you!
To continue using the application, the application need Location access. Please grant them before continuing.
